text: Having a weird issue. Got a dynamic page set up and on already dynamically created pages, when I make an update to the stylesheet, the CSS doesn't update (even when using cachebuster, clearing my cache, using incognito). If I change the url path of a page the updated CSS will show, but if I change it back to it's original url path it goes back to the non-updated CSS. :confused:
can u DM me your old and new page links?
